articles.title: Brian Cox and Hayley Atwell support the SAG-AFTRA strike - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Succession actor, 77, joined other members of the British actors union Equity as they showed their support for the SAG-AFTRA strike over in the US.
articles.content:
Brian Cox joined Hayley Attwell in supporting the SAG-AFTRA strike as they joined the stars at a protest in Leicester Square, London, on Friday.

articles.title: H.E.R. and Tia Carrere attend opening of Imelda Marcos musical - Daily Mail
articles.description: An immersive theatrical experience set to a score by Fatboy Slim and David Byrne, Here Lies Love recounts the rollercoaster life story of Imelda Marcos, through her first ladyship of the Philippines.
articles.content:
H.E.R. and Tia Carrere led the star-studded red carpet for Wednesday night's Broadway opening of the musical Here Lies Love.
